issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h6.Issue Description
When you want to package an "Appcelerator iOS Ad Hoc_Enterprise Distribution" Studio Dashboard asked to change plan whereas I am already on Indie plan.

h6.Steps to Reproduce
1. Login to Appcelerator Studio/CLI/Dashboard using Indie plan credentials.
2. Attempt packaging app "iOS Adhoc/Enterprise" option 
3. Studio takes Plan Details over and over again.
fields.summary: Indie Plan: Cannot package to iOS Adhoc/Enterprise
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126
Appcelerator CLI 4.1.2
Appcelerator SDK 4.1.0.GA

comments.body: I can deploy via CLI. But some developer is still unable to deploy via CLI. Error is saying that account is a trial account. Please see attachment.

Hi Appcelerator team,
please do something. We bougth the indie license and we are bloqued with this problem.
Do you have a workaround?

Thx for your help.
Kind regards,
Nicolas Laporte.
